thread.title: New Hyundai Grand i10 launched at a price of Rs 4.58 lakh
thread.title_full: New Hyundai Grand i10 launched at a price of Rs 4.58 lakh - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: New Hyundai Grand i10 launched at a price of Rs 4.58 lakh
text:
Hyundai India has launched the 2017 Grand i10 starting at Rs 4.58 lakh ex-showroom, Delhi. The new Hyundai Grand i10 is powered by the same 1.2 litre petrol and a new 1.2 litre diesel engine. The 1.2 litre Kappa Dual VTVT unit generates 81 hp of power at 6,000 rpm and churns out a peak torque of 113 Nm at 4,000 rpm. The new and bigger 1.2 litre U2 diesel motor generates 73 hp of power at 4,000 rpm and 190.2 Nm of torque. The petrol variants are mated to a 5-speed manual and 4-speed automatic gearbox, while the diesel versions are paired to a 5-speed manual transmission.
Both the engines now get improved fuel economy of 19.77 km/l and 17.49 km/l for the petrol manual and automatic, respectively, and 24.95 km/l for the diesel variants. These figures have been achieved as the engines are equipped with the Alternator Management System. The new Grand i10 is also equipped with Air Curtain, which is claimed to improve the aerodynamics and stability of the car and reduce the NVH (Noise Vibration and Harshness) levels.
The 2017 Grand i10 receives new exterior styling and is offered with a host of new features. The new Hyundai Grand i10 is based on the company's signature Fluidic Sculpture 2.0 design language and is equipped with the Cascade Design front grille and aerodynamic body lines. The company has reworked on the bumper which now looks bolder. The new LED DRLs (daytime running lights) now looks stylish and sporty. At the rear, the car has received dual tone revised bumper and roof mounted reflectors. Hyundai has also offered the Grand i10 with new diamond-cut alloy wheels and the side body moulding to give the car a sleeker and bolder stance.
At the rear, the car has received dual tone revised bumper and roof mounted reflectors. Speaking at the launch of New 2017 Grand i10, Y K Koo, MD & CEO, Hyundai Motor India Ltd said, “Grand i10 is a phenomenal product. It is an aspirational car that has won the hearts of its customers across the globe and has become a landmark product in HMIL’s growth story. Over 5.5 lac units of Made in India Grand i10 have been sold in India and world markets which show strong brand admiration. The launch of The New 2017 Grand i10 will create a new benchmark for the segment by offering enhanced Modern Premium Hyundai Experience to the aspirational customers.”
Watch the launch of the New Hyundai Grand i10 here:
Inside the cabin, the new Hyundai Grand i10 features a large 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system with smartphone connectivity Apple CarPlay, Android Auto and Mirror Link connectivity as well as navigation interface and voice recognition button mounted on the steering wheel. In terms of safety, the Grand i10 is offered with advanced safety features like rear parking assist system, dual front airbags, ABS (Anti-lock braking System), reverse parking sensors, and rear parking camera with the display. For the comfort and convenience, the company has also equipped the car with automatic climate control, rear AC vents, rear defogger, cooled glovebox, driver seat height adjustment and smart key with push-button start.
Also read: Here is what’s new in the 2017 Hyundai Grand i10
The variant-wise ex-showroom, Delhi prices of the 2017 Hyundai Grand i10 are:
Petrol:
Hyundai Grand i10 Era: Rs 4.58 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Magna: Rs 5.22 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Magna AT: Rs 5.98 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Sports: Rs 5.65 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Sports (O): Rs 5.96 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Sports (O) AT: Rs 6.82 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Asta: 6.39 lakh
Diesel:
Hyundai Grand i10 Era: Rs 5.68 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Magna: Rs 6.15 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Sports: 6.58 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Sports (O): Rs 6.89 lakh
Hyundai Grand i10 Asta: Rs 7.32 lakh
